subject: p11893091
Findings: As compared to the previous radiograph, the monitoring and support devices, including the temporal right pacemaker, have all been removed. The patient is in unchanged moderate pulmonary edema, with moderate cardiomegaly but without pleural effusions. No newly appeared parenchymal opacities. Unchanged mild atelectatic changes at the lung bases. No other relevant changes.
